title: Melbourne Renegades v Perth Scorchers
articleDescription: BBL cricket at Marvel Stadium on Thursday 15 January 2026
articleContent:
The Big Bash League is back for another season – bringing all the colour and excitement to Marvel Stadium. Extra services will help you get to and from the match on Thursday 15 January.

The match will begin at 7:15 pm and concludes at approximately 10:25 pm.

Before you travel

If you use Journey Planner within 14 days of this event, you'll see all the extra services we've added to help you get there.

Metropolitan train

Metro Trains Additional Services

Additional services for the following lines depart after the match:

  • Mernda, Greensborough, Ringwood, Glen Waverley, Cheltenham, Craigieburn and Upfield

Pakenham and Cranbourne Passengers are to alight on  Cheltenham services from Southern Cross (Platform 13), then transfer at Caulfield for a bus.

Frankston Passengers are to alight on Cheltenham services from Southern Cross (Platform 13), then transfer at Cheltenham for a bus.

Sandringham Passengers are to alight on Cheltenham services from Southern Cross (Platform 13), then transfer at South Yarra for a bus.

Werribee, Williamstown and Sunbury Passengers are to alight on any available Northern Group service from Southern Cross (Platform 14), then transfer at North Melbourne for a bus.

Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from Marvel Stadium

Extra trams will operate as Route 30a via La Trobe Street, and as Route 86a via Bourke Street.

Take advantage of the city’s Free Tram Zone which extends from Queen Victoria Market to Docklands, Spring Street, Flinders Street Station and Federation Square. 

Metropolitan bus

Getting to and from Marvel Stadium

Customers can catch the following bus routes close to Marvel Stadium:

  • Route 232 (Altona North to City)
  • Route 235 (Fishermans Bend to City)
  • Route 302 (Box Hill to City)
  • Route 304 (Doncaster SC to City)
  • Route 905 (The Pines SC to City)
  • Route 906 (Warrandyte to City)
  • Route 907 (Mitcham to City)

Please note, services may terminate prior to the end of the match.

Regional train

Significant service changes and coach replacements will be in place on several lines.

Please check your line on the V/Line website

Additional services for the Geelong lines have been planned. Please note that coaches replace evening trains between Southern Cross and Waurn Ponds from 8:30pm. Additional event coaches will depart from Southern Cross.
